name: griffon-xmm
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Illustration of griffon-xmm, highlight musculature and unique limbs, include human silhouette, three-color palette, underwater/sky/merged zone, depict motion, detailed concept art, aquatic fantasy realism, subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, pressure-dome materials, palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Avoid embedded text or words unless specified; never render gibberish strings., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Concept art of griffon-xmm with anatomy, scale, and environment.
revised_prompt: Imagine a painterly styled concept art illustration in the format of a tabletop fantasy game. The scene portrays a muscular griffon-like creature, highlighting its unique limbs, set in a merged environment of underwater and sky. In this ethereal zone, human silhouettes swim alongside the griffon, illuminated by strategically placed bioluminescent accents. The materials evoke the pressure of underwater domes, and subsurface caustics add a touch of aquatic realism. The color palette sticks to teals, deep blues, sea-greens, with pearl highlights illuminating the scene. All clothing and gear are consistent with a grounded medieval fantasy aesthetic and devoid of any modern technology or signs. Numbered pins are preferred to signify important elements, avoiding random letters or symbols, and all the details must maintain a seamless flow suggestive of motion. The image stays clear of styles like sci-fi UI, modern signage, photoreal CGI, and anime, as well as effects like bloom glare.
